title: A method for verifying the generalized Riemann hypothesis
authors: Ghaith Hiary, Summer Ireland, Megan Kyi
abstract:
Riemann numerically approximated at least three zeta zeros. According to
Edwards, Riemann even took steps to verify that the lowest zero he computed was
indeed the first zeta zero. This approach to verification is developed,
improved, and generalized to a large class of $L$-functions. Results of
numerical calculations demonstrating the efficacy of the method are presented.
